article_title: Q&A with Craig Perry: Reflecting on building housing, and on the affordability gap
article_text:
Homebuilder Craig Perry offers a bird’s-eye view of home affordability in South Florida

He founded Centerline Homes, sold company and now runs Perry Ventures based in Sunrise

Challenges to building affordable homes include the state’s natural barriers and rising land costs

article_metadata.news-keywords: Craig Perry, Perry Ventures, Tom Hudson, WLRN, Miami Herald, Centerline Homes, housing, investments
article_metadata.description: More than 5,000 families in South Florida are living in homes built by Craig Perry.
